parties: Director General of Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption       Vs           Amudamana Arachchige Nimal Rohana Somawardhana And another
keywords: Attorney-General’s sanction is not necessary for an appeal against an acquittal from High Court. Right of Director- General of the Bribery Commission to file an appeal against an acquittal. No requirement to obtain leave from High Court,  to appeal No judgment of acquittal can be entered on lack of jurisdiction
legistation: Section 331(1) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act. Sections 15(a) and 16(1) of the Judicature Act. Section 13(2) of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption.
